name: Jump Peasant
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2022

Game inspired by your cousin Jump K., you decide tackle a small castle in a calm and relaxing scenery and try not to rage on your way to the top. There's also cake at the top.

Controls:

WASD -> Move
Space -> Jump
Esc -> Quit game

Instalation:

Extract the file and run JumpPeasant.exe

Disclaimer: Not related to Jump King
